name: Textiles and Mixed Media Art
description: Learn how to incorporate hand embroidery into drawings and paintings. Inspired by Griselda Rosas’ multimedia artwork, participants will learn how to use embroidery to add lines and texture onto artworks. Participants will also learn about Rosas’ roots in Tijuana, MX, and San Diego, CA and how this experience has informed her art practice.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
